grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 本旨【ホンシ】main object, principal object, true aim
宗旨【シュウシ】tenets (doctrines) of a religious sect, (religious) sect
kun reading compounds: 旨【むね】principle, aim, main purpose, central part, pillar, purport, gist, drift, meaning, instructions, orders, intention, wishes
旨とする【むねとする】to make it a principle to ..., to aim at doing
その旨【そのむね】(words to) that effect
上手い【うまい】skillful, skilful, clever, expert, wise, successful, delicious, appetizing, appetising, tasty, fortunate, splendid, promising
うまい汁【うまいしる】the lion's share, the cream
